ovdesc.p: Contains details of installed Products and Components for the customer.

desc.p: This field hold the updates installed in the client environment.
Validation Rules:.Up to 35 type A (alphanumeric) characters.
Contains a list of currently installed Components.
The ID of this record should be in the format CUSTOMER_ENVIRONMENT
This field holds the date and time of last download.
If this is enabled, then the customer will be kept informed of updates particular to the installed Component.
This field holds the date and time of last registration.
Contains a list of currently installed Products
This field holds the OS.PLATFORM that the system is using.
Should have an entry in EB.OS.PLATFORM application.
Help Text for this field is unavailable. Please refer to the T24 User Guides for further information.
If this field contains ‘YES’ the record is deleted.
Enter a description of the environment.
The GA Release that this customer has installed.
